knimeNode.name: RDKit To InChI
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts RDKit molecules into InChI Codes and optionally also into InChI Keys.

fullDescription.intro: Converts RDKit molecules into InChI Codes and optionally also into InChI Keys. Additionally, it offers options to generate extra information about the generation process (return code, aux information, message, log message) and gives the user the possibility to specify switches to influence the InChI code generation in certain ways.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The input column with RDKit Molecules.
Enable to remove the specified source column from the result table.

option.name: New column name for InChI codes

tab.option: The name of the new column, which will contain the InChi code.
Enable to also generated InChI Keys.

option.name: New column name for InChI keys

tab.option: The name of the new column, which will contain the InChi keys.

option.name: New column name prefix for extra information

tab.option: The prefix of column names, which will contain the extra information about InChI code generation.
Enable to also generated a column that contains the return code of the InChI generation routine.
Enable to also generated a column that contains aux information about the InChI code.
Enable to also generated a column that contains a message generated during the InChI generation routine.
Enable to also generated a column that contains a log message of the InChI generation routine.

tab.name: Advanced
tab.option:
Specify here space-separated switches, which need to start with / or - to influence the InChI code generation. Some of them make the resulting InChI code Non-standard. A good overview about possible switches can be found here:
http://www.inchi-trust.org/fileadmin/user_upload/html/inchifaq/inchi-faq.html#15.14
